name: All For One (itch) (Bronto Games)
description:
All For One is my entry for the Black and White Jam 8. The theme was "Loop" so I made a platformer where you loop to the beginning of the level and have to use your previous self as a platform or object.  20 levels, lots of hazards, and a great art style thanks to Kenney.nl  

Controls:

MenusMouse ClickMovementArrow KeysLoopZRestart LevelX
